trans-unit.source: Specifies the behaviors of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Especifica os comportamentos de uma <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> do objeto em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> controlar quando o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> é clicado.

trans-unit.source: The HotSpotMode enumeration represents the behaviors that you can apply to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: A enumeração HotSpotMode representa os comportamentos que você pode aplicar a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objeto dentro de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties use these enumeration values to set the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades usam esses valores de enumeração para definir o comportamento de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objeto quando ele for clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specified on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object takes precedence over the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the control.
trans-unit.target: Se ambas as propriedades forem definidas, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade especificada em cada indivíduo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objeto tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade no controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> gets its behavior from the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar `HotSpotMode.NotSet` para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de um indivíduo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objeto, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>obtém seu comportamento de que o contém <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property is either `NotSet` or no value is specified, the default behavior is to navigate to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Nesse cenário, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>propriedade está `NotSet` ou nenhum valor for especificado, o comportamento padrão é navegar até uma URL.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's behavior is not specified using either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects it contains, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>comportamento do controle não é especificado usando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objetos que ele contém, por padrão, o comportamento `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: In addition, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects that an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control contains are set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` and no value is specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the default behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, se o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Propriedades o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objetos que um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controle contém são definidos como `HotSpotMode.NotSet` e nenhum valor for especificado para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o comportamento padrão é `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the page navigates to a URL when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar `HotSpotMode.Navigate` para qualquer um de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>a página de propriedade, navega para uma URL quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade para especificar a URL de navegação.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.Image.NavigateUrl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the page generates a postback to the server when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar `HotSpotMode.PostBack` para qualquer um de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade ou o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, a página gera um postback para o servidor quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>é clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>propriedade para especificar um nome para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when the postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: Esse nome será passado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>dados de evento quando ocorre o evento de postback.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Quando um postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>é clicado, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar programaticamente as ações executadas quando um postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>é clicado, fornecer um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object does not have any behavior when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Se você especificar `HotSpotMode.Inactive` para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>objeto não tem nenhum comportamento de quando ele for clicado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse valor para criar um ponto de acesso inativo dentro de um ponto de acesso de active maior.

trans-unit.source: This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot spot zones within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Essa opção é fornecida para que você possa criar zonas de ponto de acesso mais complexas em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active one in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: Para criar uma área inativa em um ponto de acesso a ativo, você deve especificar o ponto de acesso inativo antes do ativo no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ```
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a seguinte <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>define um anel active especificando um ponto de acesso circular inativo dentro de um ponto de acesso circular active maior: ``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ``` </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> does not have any behavior.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> não tem nenhum comportamento.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> navega para uma URL.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> uses the behavior set by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode*> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> usa o comportamento definido <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> do controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode*>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control does not define the behavior, the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object navigates to a URL.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"> </xref> controle não define o comportamento, o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> objeto navega para uma URL.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> generates a postback to the server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"> </xref> gera um postback para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.
